description: The CP210x USB to UART Bridge Virtual COM Port (VCP) drivers are required for device operation as a Virtual COM Port to facilitate host communication with CP210x products.
notes: The CP210x Manufacturing DLL and Runtime DLL have been updated and must be used with v 6.0 and later of the CP210x Windows VCP Driver.
Application Note Software downloads affected are AN144SW.zip, AN205SW.zip and AN223SW.zip.
If you are using a 5.x driver and need support you can download Legacy OS Software.
